name: restfuncs
description: Test that covers client and server code at the same time

scripts.clean: tsc --build --clean && cd client && npm run clean && cd .. && cd server && npm run clean && cd .. && cd restfuncs-metapackage && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.build: tsc --build --force && cd client && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm run build && cd .. && cd restfuncs-metapackage && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && cp LICENSE readme.md client && cp LICENSE readme.md server && cp LICENSE readme.md restfuncs-metapackage
scripts.publishAll: npm run prepublish && npm publish --workspace server --workspace client --workspace restfuncs-metapackage

author: Boris Gingold <bogeee@bogitech.de>
